Sentencas: Fuel electrode supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) fabricated at ICMA have been characterised in both solid oxide steam electrolyser (SOEC) and fuel cell modes.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The cells consists of a fuel electrode supporting tube of Ni/YSZ with 40% porosity, similar to 400 mu m thickness, 2.4 mm diameter and 100-150 mm length, a 15 mu m thick YSZ electrolyte and a 50 vol% LSM/YSZ composite air electrode of 20 mu m thickness and LSM/YSZ (80/20 vol%) up to 2 cm(2) area as current collector in the air side.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Platinum paste and wires were used as interconnectors in the air chamber and Ni felt in the fuel side.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SOFC and SOEC experiments were performed at temperatures between 750 and 950 degrees C using synthetic air in the oxygen electrode and different partial pressures of steam in the fuel side.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Analysis of the polarisation contributions to the j-V curve in FC operation mode was performed using theoretical models, as discussed in the text.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effect of the steam concentration and temperature on the electrolysis and fuel cell experiments is presented and discussed.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The cells are reversible in both modes of operation at low fuel conversion rates.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: According with previous observations, when cells are operated at high steam conversion rates the cell voltage tends to saturate.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Irreversible damage was observed by SEM at the YSZ-oxygen electrode interface after operation, probably due to the electrolyte reduction produced at high voltages.
Titulo: Performance and Aging of Microtubular YSZ-based Solid Oxide Regenerative Fuel Cells
